content.description: As you approach from the road, a tour to the right will expose an overhanging block with a pleasant perch and smooth ramp above. You can begin under the block, moving right and up through the small overhang onto the perch. Enjoy lunch here or walk the ramp to the summit.
content.location: Overtake the block by any means. Moving right is easier, but experimentation with exclusions will afford a variety of interesting options.

content.description: This is the landmark block and entry point to the 12 boulders in the very near surrounding area. There are two V-Easy lines to the summit (the Descent Route on the North, and 'FlipFlops' on the south earning its knick-name from the consistent attempts of family campers taking a shot at in in flip-flops and cut-offs) and plenty of opportunity to set top-ropes for a shot at the steeper lines and harder projects.
